title: LF High Bronze/Low Silver Duo

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hi there. I am bronze 1 ADC main (was silver 3 at the end of pre-season). I only recently got back into league after a long break. I'm looking for any role who can just win lane and peel for me in team-fights.  I'm not gonna lie and tell you that i'm amazing and my team is always shit, because that's not true I understand that if you're good enough to get out of lower elo, you will. I currently do coaching sessions with a diamond 5 adc main and i'm trying to improve as much as possible while focusing on school and a part time job. If you are interested please let me know by posting here or adding me on LoL. My ingame name is Enzone.

Thanks.

replies.body:
hey im bronze 2 support i main sona but can also play lulu or soraka  and im looking for someone to duo que with myself 
IGN Fire Flareon
i'm a bronze 2 hardcore troll add me for fun games xD I can play seriously if you want though. IGN; D1ld0Baggins
